description: Create a Scratch version of Flappy Bird

steps.title: Make Flappy Bird fall
steps.description: Use a forever loop to make Flappy Bird fall

components.text: Open the **Scratch Starter Project**

components.blocks:
when FLAG clicked
go to x: (-50) y: (0)
forever
	change y by (-3)
	point in direction [100 v]
end

steps.description: Make Flappy flap upwards when you press the space bar

components.blocks:
when [space v] key pressed
repeat (10)
	next costume
	change y by (9)
	point in direction [80 v]
end

steps.title: Add the pipes
steps.description: Next we'll add some obstacles for Flappy to fly through

components.text: Click on the **Paint new sprite** button.
If the costume is in `Bitmap Mode` click **Convert to vector**
Click on the **Rectangle** button
Click **Solid Fill** button to draw a solid rectangle
Select a **Dark Green** from the color pallet
Click and drag two boxes to create the pipe shown
Select a **Light Green** from the color pallet
Click and drag two inner boxes to create the pipe shown
Click the **i** button on your sprite to name it
Name your sprite **Pipe**
+ Click on your **Pipe** sprite and select the `Scripts` tab.

components.blocks:
when FLAG clicked
        hide
        set size to (200)%
        forever
            create clone of [myself v]
            wait (2) secs

    when I start as a clone
        go to x: (240) y: (pick random (-80) to (80))
        show
        repeat (120)
            change x by (-4)
        end
        delete this clone

tests.text: __Click the green flag__, do pipes appear with gaps to fly through at different heights? If you find it difficult to navigate Flappy through the pipes without touching them, you can make the gap bigger in the **pipe** sprite by editing the costume.

components.text: + Let's add a sound to play when Flappy collides. Click on the **Flappy** sprite then on the `Sounds` tab.
Click the `Choose sound from library` button.
Pick a collision sound for **Flappy**. The **screech** sound is good.
Now click back on the `Scripts` tab.

steps.description: When something falls under gravity it doesn't usually fall at a fixed rate. For this challenge we will make Flappy fall as if under gravity.
steps.title: add gravity

components.text: + Replace the `broadcast GameOver`

components.blocks:
when I receive [Fall v]
        repeat (10)
            turn ccw (5) degrees

    when I receive [Fall v]
        repeat until <(y position) < [-180]>
            change y by (rise)
            change [rise v] by (-0.4)
        end
        hide
        broadcast [GameOver v]
